Project2

Class InputManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • Project2.InputManager

  • public class InputManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class with the main function of receiving input and returning a InputCommands enumeration. This enumeration definition is inherited by other classes and thus the translation of Slick2d Input is made.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  InputManager.InputCommands
      defines the output that will become the movement language for the BasicBeing objects in the game.

    • Method Detail

      • ProcessInput

        public static InputManager.InputCommands ProcessInput(org.newdawn.slick.Input input,
                                                      int stateId)
        Based on the stateID reports an InputCommands
        Parameters:
        input - - Slick2d Input type passed in from some Update method.
        stateId - - the stateId sending the input message. !!! When a new state requiring Input is added this method must be updated!!!
        Returns:
        based on the stateID returns Menu or GamePlay InputCommands.
